title: The Nostradamus Design
description: Abraham Lincoln and John F. Kennedy are the two most famous presidents to have fallen to the Presidential Curse, but not the only ones. The Native American curse has also claimed the lives of Presidents William Harrison, James Garfield, William McKinley, Warren Harding, and Franklin Roosevelt.In 1981 Max Medici leads the Advance Intelligence division of the US Secret Service. Having failed to protect President Kennedy from the Presidential Curse and the highly secretive First Order, Max is determined to redeem himself and protect the next curse-term president, Ronald Reagan.An even greater threat looms in the present day, as terrorists launch a First Order plan that endangers the entire planet. As a descendant of Nostradamus, Max must find and decode his ancestor’s clues in time to follow the 16th century design to save the 21st century world.Max‘s questionable decisions during the Kennedy and Reagan administrations greatly impact both sides of the present day conflict. With the First Order plotting against his every move, Max must depend upon Nostradamus’ cryptic prophecies and the help of his protégé, Michael Maze, as he strives to prevent the impending catastrophe.
author: Vincent Ray
